name: Imriaz Eman
description: The Model 3 Performance is everything in one. It is fast (very fast), it is quiet and comfortable

name: Saifulla
description: Nice car. It's beautiful, super millage, good top glass, good looking and powerful quality. Overall good TESLA

name: Tasnim Sultan
description: This is a perfect sedan with all-electric driving, and this car being electric has a pretty. Good range (507km).

name: Amirul Islam
description: Best car of Tesla but too expensive. The range is good, top speed is less, and the best looking car of Tesla.

name: Sajid Ullah
description: One of the best companies in the automobile industry. They make future cars for every type of person.

name: Shantu PY
description: The price Starsts from 60 lakhs onwards. Ordinary people can't buy this car.

name: Ansary Islam
description: The best car in the world and I want to buy it. When it will come to Bangladesh.

name: Tasnim tamanna
description: Beautiful and awesome choice absolutely lives of perfectly featuring. Tesla electric vehicles are my favorite choice

name: Reaz ceo
description: Amazing car and the autopilot works very nicely. Hopefully, Elon Musk launches Tesla into the Indian market.

name: Shanto NY
description: It is a very awesome car. It is very comfortable and more speed and also safe and it is a bulletproof also so. I love this car.
